```
#define N 100
typedef int semaphore;
semaphore mutex = 1;
semaphore empty = N;
semaphore full = 0;

void producer() {
    while(TRUE) {
        int item = produce_item();
        down(&empty); // emptymutex
        down(&mutex);
        insert_item(item);
        up(&mutex);
        up(&full);
    }
}

void consumer() {
    while(TRUE) {
        down(&full);
        down(&mutex);
        int item = remove_item();
        consume_item(item);
        up(&mutex);
        up(&empty);
    }
}
```

```
#define N 100
typedef int semaphore;
semaphore mutex = 1;
semaphore empty = N;
semaphore full = 0;

void producer() {
    while(TRUE) {
        int item = produce_item();
        down(&empty); // emptymutex
        down(&mutex);
        insert_item(item);
        up(&mutex);
        up(&full);
    }
}

void consumer() {
    while(TRUE) {
        down(&full);
        down(&mutex);
        int item = remove_item();
        consume_item(item);
        up(&mutex);
        up(&empty);
    }
}
```
